alert.note: Alert for Richmond (Staten Is.) (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued February 20 at 3:42PM EST until February 21 at 11:00AM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT IN EFFECT TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level expected in vulnerable areas near the waterfront and shoreline. * WHERE...In New Jersey, Hudson, Eastern Essex and Eastern Union Counties. In New York, Richmond (Staten Island) County. * WHEN...Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...Brief minor flooding of the most vulnerable locations near the waterfront and shoreline. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...There is potential for additional minor coastal flooding for the Wed PM into Thu PM high tides with an expansive low pressure system moving through the area.
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways.
